readFile

public static SOMMap readFile(java.io.File file)
                       throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                              java.io.IOException
Reads the structure of this SOMMap from a file Note: currently only hexagonal nodes are supported The file has to be compatible with the .cod file format as specified in the @see SOMToolbox documentation

Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException
java.io.IOException

getBMU

public int[] getBMU(double[] vector)
Given a value vector - will return the node of this som that matches best according to the euclidian distance (Best Matching Unit = BMU)

Returns:
x and y "coordinate" of the BMU in the som

getMap

public double[][][] getMap()
Getter for the map containing all the value vectors of all the nodes => 3 dimensional: x + y dimension of the map + 1 dimensional array for the value vector Accessable like this: map[x][y][value vec component]

the map
